title: npm install fails at sha3@1.2.2 install script
body:
<!-- Briefly describe the issue you're experiencing. Tell us what you were trying to do and what happened instead. -->

Unable to successfully run `npm install` with partial backtrace provided in details section below.

<!-- Remember, this is not a place to ask for help debugging code. For that, we welcome you in the OpenZeppelin Community Forum: https://forum.openzeppelin.com/. -->

**üíª Environment**
```
macOS - v10.14.6
node - v12.8.0
truffle - v5.0.29
solc - 0.5.10+commit.5a6ea5b1.Darwin.appleclang
```
<!-- Tell us what version of OpenZeppelin Contracts you're using, and how you're using it: Truffle, Remix, etc. -->

**üìù Details**

The problem is discussed [here](https://github.com/phusion/node-sha3/pull/44) and has been apparently fixed in `node-sha3v2.0.0` although this is not a direct dependency of your repo. My best guess is that the fix here would involve bumping the truffle version (which likely has `sha3` as a direct dependency).

```
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:196:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:203:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:272:12)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 18.7.0
gyp ERR! command "/usr/local/Cellar/node/12.8.0/bin/node" "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /Users/admin/Projects/bh2smith/openzeppelin-contracts/node_modules/sha3
gyp ERR! node -v v12.8.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v5.0.3
gyp ERR! not ok 
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: secp256k1@2.0.4 (node_modules/eccrypto/node_modules/secp256k1):
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: secp256k1@2.0.4 install: `npm run rebuild`
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Exit status 1
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: scrypt@6.0.3 (node_modules/scrypt):
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: scrypt@6.0.3 install: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Exit status 1

npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! sha3@1.2.2 install: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the sha3@1.2.2 install script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/admin/.npm/_logs/2019-10-07T20_05_32_835Z-debug.log
``` 


<!-- Describe the problem you have been experiencing in more detail. Include as much information as you think is relevant. Keep in mind that transactions can fail for many reasons; context is key here. -->

**üî¢ Code to reproduce bug**

```
npm install
```

<!-- We will be able to better help if you provide a minimal example that triggers the bug. -->

At this point, I have been able to fix this by running `npm install --save-dev sha3` which appends

```
"sha3": "^2.0.7"
```
to the `devDependencies` of this project's `package.lock` file. I am now able to run `npm test` and everything seems totally fine. Although, you may not wish to have `sha3` as a direct dependency of this project and would have to dig and determine which existing dependency is pegged to this older version of sha3.

It looks like the culprit is `keccakjs`, which we get from `solidity-coverage`, `eth-lib` and `ethereumjs-abi`, which in turn come from `web3`. I'd be surprised to find that `web3` doesn't work on Node 12, is it possible that you're missing some other dependency and that is breaking the build process? Could you paste the full error log? Thanks!

Sure thing! This is a cropped version of all the returned errors.


```
...
9 warnings and 13 errors generated.
make: *** [Release/obj.target/keccak/src/addon.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:196:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:203:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:272:12)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 18.7.0
gyp ERR! command "/usr/local/Cellar/node/12.8.0/bin/node" "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /Users/admin/Projects/bh2smith/openzeppelin-contracts/node_modules/keccak
gyp ERR! node -v v12.8.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v5.0.3
gyp ERR! not ok

npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the keccak@1.4.0 rebuild script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.
npm WARN Local package.json exists, but node_modules missing, did you mean to install?

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/admin/.npm/_logs/2019-10-07T21_04_33_910Z-debug.log

...

9 warnings and 8 errors generated.
make: *** [Release/obj.target/scrypt/src/node-boilerplate/scrypt_common.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:196:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:203:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:272:12)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 18.7.0
gyp ERR! command "/usr/local/Cellar/node/12.8.0/bin/node" "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /Users/admin/Projects/bh2smith/openzeppelin-contracts/node_modules/scrypt
gyp ERR! node -v v12.8.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v5.0.3
gyp ERR! not ok 

...

9 warnings and 8 errors generated.
make: *** [Release/obj.target/secp256k1/src/addon.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:196:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:203:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:272:12)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 18.7.0
gyp ERR! command "/usr/local/Cellar/node/12.8.0/bin/node" "/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /Users/admin/Projects/bh2smith/openzeppelin-contracts/node_modules/secp256k1
gyp ERR! node -v v12.8.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v5.0.3
gyp ERR! not ok 
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! secp256k1@3.5.2 rebuild: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm ERR! Exit status 1

npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

...

10 warnings and 12 errors generated.
make: *** [Release/obj.target/sha3/src/addon.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:196:23)
gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:203:13)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:272:12)

gyp ERR! cwd /Users/admin/Projects/bh2smith/openzeppelin-contracts/node_modules/sha3
gyp ERR! node -v v12.8.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v5.0.3
gyp ERR! not ok 
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: secp256k1@2.0.4 (node_modules/eccrypto/node_modules/secp256k1):
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: secp256k1@2.0.4 install: `npm run rebuild`
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Exit status 1
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: scrypt@6.0.3 (node_modules/scrypt):
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: scrypt@6.0.3 install: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Exit status 1

npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! sha3@1.2.2 install: `node-gyp rebuild`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the sha3@1.2.2 install script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/admin/.npm/_logs/2019-10-07T21_04_52_041Z-debug.log
```
We should update our dependencies. I also think we should set up Dependabot to do this automatically.
